easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I run but never walk. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of something that moves in the wind and has a tail.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: The word itself is a small number, and adding two letters changes its meaning.

hard.q: A box contains two balls. You can take out one ball at a time. Each time you take one, you replace it with a new ball with a number equal to the two balls you took so far. How many balls are in the box after n steps?
hard.a: There are always 2 balls in the box
hard.hint: Consider the rule: the box starts with two balls, and at each step you replace the drawn ball with a new one whose number equals the total drawn so far.
